title: Vitalik Dumps ETH: Bearish Signal or Strategic Move? #shorts
transcript: Vitalic is dumping. He's dumping. He's dumping like there's no tomorrow. He basically nuked all of the L2s a few days ago when he said that he doesn't believe in L2s anymore. So, all of them dumped a lot. And now he's also dumping the crap out of ETH [laughter] over the last three days. Vitalic sold approximately $6.6 million at an average price of $2.2,000 for ETH. I mean, normally when he dumps, especially in big amounts, we do have a bit of a a bit of a leg down. I mean normally he dumps and it sends a signal to the market that he's not too bullish. Now if you look at his whole holdings it's not too big part of it. So that's important context that is not like he dumps everything but he is aggressive. He's aggressive in this bearish times where each and every piece of sentiment matter.
